Title: Relates to authorizing the creation and issuance of a distinctive 4-H member license plate
Summary: Authorizes the creation and issuance of a distinctive 4-H member license plate and sets up a 4-H foundation fund for excess monies to be deposited.
LawCode: Add ยง404-ff, V & T L; add ยง96-a, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to creating the "4-H member" distinctive license plate; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the 4-H foundation fund
